data.title: Allston Brighton Community Development Corporation
data.text:
When and where is All Bright Night?

All Bright Night will take place on Tuesday, October 1st from 6-9pm at Garage B Events at the Speedway (1420 Soldiers Field Rd, Boston, MA 02135)

Do I need a printed ticket after I register?

No printed tickets are required for the event! When you arrive at the event, please visit the registration table and give your name/ the name of your sponsoring organization to check in.

Will there be food/ drinks at the event?

Yes, there will be appetizers, small plates, and desserts during the event (options for dietary restrictions including gluten free and vegan). There will also be a cash bar.

Does the event have a dress code?

The event does not have a specific dress code, but most attendees wear business casual attire.

Where can I park at the event space?

Parking is available for all guests in the parking lot at 1400 Soldiers Field Road in Brighton. Please NOT LOT leave your car in this lot overnight.

Is the event space accessible by public transportation?

Garage B is accessible on the 70 and 86 bus routes.

Event Details

Join us for All Bright Night, Allston Brighton CDC's annual night of celebration! We are looking forward to meeting again with community leaders, elected officials, and neighbors alike. We can't wait to celebrate on Tuesday, October 1st from 6-9 PM at Garage B at The Speedway (1420 Soldiers Field Rd in Brighton).

To register for All Bright Night: Please provide your name, email, and number of tickets being requested. Tickets are $55 per person.

*If the ticket price is an issue, please contact Sean Tatar at [email protected] for information about reduced admission.

Allston Brighton CDC (ABCDC) reserves the right to use any photograph/video taken at any event sponsored by ABCDC without the expressed written permission of those included within the photograph/video. ABCDC may use the photograph/video in publications or other media material produced, used, or contracted by ABCDC. To ensure the privacy of individuals and children, images will not be identified using full names or personal identifying information without written approval from the photographed/videotaped subject, parent, or legal guardian. A person attending an ABCDC event who does not wish to have their image recorded for distribution should make their wishes known to the event organizers or contact ABCDC directly.
